member.name: T:Yaml2JsonNode.YamlConverter
member.summary: Provides extensions to convert YAML models to JSON models.

member.name: M:Yaml2JsonNode.YamlConverter.ToJsonNode(YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.YamlStream)
member.summary: Converts all of the documents in a YAML stream to s.
member.returns: A collection of nodes representing the YAML documents in the stream.

member.name: M:Yaml2JsonNode.YamlConverter.ToJsonNode(YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.YamlDocument)
member.summary: Converts a single YAML document to a .
member.returns: A `JsonNode` representative of the YAML document.

member.name: M:Yaml2JsonNode.YamlConverter.ToJsonNode(YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.YamlNode)
member.summary: Converts a single YAML node to a .
member.returns: A `JsonNode` representative of the YAML node.
member.exception: Thrown for YAML that is not compatible with JSON.

member.name: M:Yaml2JsonNode.YamlConverter.ToYamlNode(System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonNode)
member.summary: Converts a single JSON node to a .

member.summary: Serializes a YAML document to a string.

member.summary: Parses YAML text into a stream (collection of documents).
member.returns: A YAML stream representing the content of the text.
